text: alehoriya Rayu shcho obitsyayetʹsya dlya spravedlyvyy tse: tse maye richky unpolluted voda, ta richky svizhoho moloka, ta richok vyna - duzhe smachnoho dlya drinkers - ta richky natyahnutoho medu. Vony mayutʹ vsi riznovydy fruktiv tam, ta forgiveness z yikhnʹoho Lorda. (Vony krashche) abo tsey khto perebuyutʹ zavzhdy u thehellfire, ta p'yutʹ hellish vodu shcho rve yikhniy kyshechnyk
